ca.bitjutsu.kloutacular.v2
Interface KloutScoreManager.OnScoreUpdatedListener

Enclosing class:
KloutScoreManager
public static interface KloutScoreManager.OnScoreUpdatedListener

Listener interface for Klout score updates.

Since:
0.1
Author:
Adam Carruthers (adam.carruthers@bitjutsu.ca)

Method Summary
 void onReceive(KloutScore ks)
          Passes the result of the most recently returned request to the Klout API.
 

Method Detail

onReceive

void onReceive(KloutScore ks)
Passes the result of the most recently returned request to the Klout API. Be sure to check that this is the Klout score you are trying to receive, as KloutScoreManager uses multiple worker threads, and therefore can return out of request order.

Parameters:
ks - the most recently retrieved KloutScore
